pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau speaks with Prime Minister Imran Khan of the Islamic Republic of Pakistan | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
The Prime Minister spoke today with Imran Khan, Prime Minister of the Islamic Republic of Pakistan, who called to congratulate the Prime Minister on his re-election. 

The two leaders reaffirmed the longstanding friendship between Canada and Pakistan, anchored in robust people-to-people ties and the importance of strong and growing bilateral relations.

They exchanged views on shared priorities including the promotion of commercial ties, girlsâ€™ education, and the protection of human rights and religious freedom.   

The Prime Ministers discussed regional and global issues of concern, including the situation in Kashmir.  

The two leaders committed to work closely together to further strengthen Canada-Pakistan ties.
